title: Nomination of Jennifer Wicks McNamara to be Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the United States to the Socialist Republic of Vietnam
summary: Jennifer Wicks McNamara, a resident of Virginia, has been nominated to serve as the United States Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary to the Socialist Republic of Vietnam. The nomination has been transmitted to the United States Senate.

title: Presidential Proclamation Declaring National Day of Remembrance for Charlie Kirk
summary: A presidential proclamation designates a National Day of Remembrance in response to the assassination of Charlie Kirk. The document notes the events of September 10, 2025, and calls for nationwide observances to honor Kirk's memory and reflect on the impact of the incident.

title: Proclamation by the President on the 250th Anniversary of the Founding of the United States Navy
summary: This presidential proclamation acknowledges the origins of the United States Navy in 1775, when the Second Continental Congress established a naval force, and marks the 250th anniversary in 2025. It describes the Navy's evolution and its contributions to national security, maritime operations, and humanitarian missions, and it recognizes current and former Navy service members. The proclamation invites appropriate observances, educational activities, and public recognition of the Navy across federal, state, and local communities.
